text: @CCllrMarkPerks @spionkop8 @LancashireCC @EnvAgencyNW Hi there Mark, thanks for your tweet and sorry to see this. Is this flooding following heavy rainfall or is there signs if sewerage in the water? Thanks, Saffron
RT @plumeplotter: It seems that incinerator pollution permits are worthless. The @EnvAgency allows/encourages polluters to exceed them when‚Ä¶

@suesustainable @EnvAgencySW @BristolAvonRT @DJWarburton @EnvAgency And it is not just slurry going on our fields, but digestate from local Anaerobic Digester plants - many of which are not proprely regulated or run. What effects do digestates have on human health, animal health or soil fertility? From what I have seen, there is not enough study.
